GlobalVariables.StudyDescription: This project is retrieved from API site:http://192.168.52.132/redcap_service/

Description.TranslatedText: Please select participant's type of measurements.
Please enter participant's weight (kg) measured by research professional.
Please enter participant's height (cm) measured by research professional.
Please enter participant's waist circumference (cm) measured by research professional.
Please enter participant's hip circumference (cm) measured by research professional.
Please enter participant's usual self-reported weight (please select preferred units).
Please enter participant's usual self-reported weight (kg).
Please enter usual self-reported weight in stones & pounds.
Please enter usual self-reported height (please select preferred units).
Please enter participant's usual self-reported height (cm).
Please enter participant's usual self-reported height (feet & inches).
Please enter participant's usual self-reported waist circumference (please select preferred units).
Please enter participant's usual self-reported waist circumference (cm).
Please enter participant's usual self-reported waist circumference (inches).
Please enter participant's usual self-reported hip circumference (please select preferred units).
Please enter participant's usual self-reported hip circumference (cm).
Please enter participant's usual self-reported hip circumference (inches).
Complete?
EXCEED study ID

This is a check on participant's EXCEED study ID. Please only attempt the questionnaire if there is a 2 or 4 in the box once you have scanned participant's ID above. If you are recruiting a participant from primary care you should have 2 in this box. If you are recruiting a participant from smoking cessation services you should have a 4. Please contact EXCEED study administrator if this is not the case.
Has the participant consented?
Please select research professional's name taking participant's consent.
Please select participant's gender.
Please enter participant's date of birth (DD-MM-YYYY).
Complete?
Is the participant registered with a GP practice in Leicester city or the county?
Please select the name of participant's medical practice they are registered with as a patient.
Please select the name of participant's medical practice they are registered with as a patient.
Please select the name of participant's medical practice they are registered with as a patient.
Please enter the name of participant's medical practice they are registered with.
What is the name of the road the medical practice participant told us about above is on?
What is the name of the doctor participant usually likes to see at this practice?
Complete?
Has participant's recruitment to the study completed successfully?
Do you have any comments regarding participant's recruitment?
Please specify your comments regarding participant's recruitment.
Complete?
Please scan saliva collector barcode (after collection of saliva sample from participant).
Please select the saliva collection kit used by the participant.
Complete?
Chest infection in the last month (i.e. influenza, bronchitis, severe cold, pneumonia)
History of detached retina
Heart attack in the last three months
Surgery to eyes, chest, or abdomen in the last three months
History of a collapsed lung
Pregnancy (1st or 3rd trimester)
Currently on medication for tuberculosis
Was participant's blow acceptable?
Please enter FEV1 from participant's FIRST acceptable blow.
Please enter FVC from participant's FIRST acceptable blow.
Was participant's blow acceptable?
Please enter FEV1 from participant's SECOND acceptable blow.
Please enter FVC from participant's SECOND acceptable blow.
Was participant's blow acceptable?
Please enter FEV1 from participant's THIRD acceptable blow.
Please enter FVC from participant's THIRD acceptable blow.
Has spirometry been completed?
Has spirometry been completed according to protocol?
Please specify the reason why spirometry has not been completed according to protocol.
Complete?
